text: 3. What is the plain text message that corresponds to the ciphertext 01 09 00 12 12 09 24 10 that is produced using modular exponentiation with modulus p = 29 and encryption key e = 57 You are given that d = 17. Write down the encyrption and decryption formulae. The decrypted number blocks are 01 04 00 12 12 04 20 15. How do you interpret these numbers in terms of the cipher text? (5pts)
